description: SQLite databases contain data stored in one or more tables . Applications often store data in and retrieve data from SQLite databases to show information to users. These embedded app databases sometimes use the .sqlitedb extension.
For example, the iOS Contacts app stores users' contacts in a file named AddressBook.sqlitedb . As another example, various tile-based mapping programs store map data in SQLITEDB files.
NOTE: SQLite databases also use the .SQLITE extension.
